title: FA Cup: Colchester cruise to FA Cup win over eighth-tier Sudbury - highlights
description: Watch highlights as League Two Colchester put four goals past Isthmian League Division One North side AFC Sudbury to progress to the FA Cup second round.

title: Marilia Mendonca: Popular Brazil singer dies in plane crash at 26
description: Marília Mendonça, one of Brazil's most famous singers, was known for her songs focussing on women.

title: Camels escape circus and wander Madrid streets
description: Eight camels and a llama were found, with managers blaming their escape on animal rights activists.

title: Azeem Rafiq racism case: Ripple effect of Yorkshire cricket crisis
description: Businesses in the shadow of Headingley Stadium say the Azeem Rafiq racism row poses a threat to them.

title: Owen Paterson row: How did PM score spectacular own goal?
description: After a week of rebellions, U-turns and resignations, the BBC's Iain Watson explains what went on behind closed doors.

title: T20 World Cup: Watch highlights as India bowlers tear through Scotland
description: Watch highlights as a brilliant bowling performance by India reduces Scotland to 87 all out during a dominant eight-wicket victory at the T20 World Cup.

title: Greta Thunberg: Who is the climate campaigner and what are her aims?
description: The Swedish teenager started a climate change protest that grew into a global movement.

title: My Day at COP26: 'By helping out delegates I'm remembering granddad'
description: Harjot Singh Kambo is one of an army of volunteers helping COP26 visitors find their way around. Here he explains why the task is a very personal one for him.

title: Metal detectorist finds small gold bible near York
description: The tiny item is thought to have been owned by a medieval aristocrat or relative of Richard III.

title: In pictures: Birmingham's German Christmas market lights up city
description: The Christmas event returns after being cancelled in 2020 due to the pandemic.

title: Delhi pollution: Are Diwali fireworks to blame?
description: Do fireworks let off during Diwali celebrations really cause that much pollution?

title: The investigations into Boris Johnson and the government
description: From the Greensill affair to renovations of Boris Johnson's flat, lots of questions are being asked.

title: NFL highlights: Jonathan Taylor scores 78-yard touchdown as Indianapolis Colts beat New York Jets
description: Watch the highlights as Jonathan Taylor's 78-yard touchdown helps Indianapolis Colts on their way to a 45-30 victory over the New York Jets in the NFL.

title: Owen Paterson: Minister defends U-turn over MP's conduct probe
description: Cabinet minister Nadhim Zahawi admits a government plan to overhaul MPs' standards was a "mistake".

title: COP26: Duke of Edinburgh-style climate award to launch
description: The announcement comes as activist Greta Thunberg joins a climate protest by young people in Glasgow.

title: Nicky Campbell praises co-host Rachel Burden on his last 5 Live Breakfast show
description: The presenter praised his co-host and "amazing friend" Rachel Burden during his final programme.

title: England v New Zealand: Poppy Cleall to captain England for first time
description: Poppy Cleall will captain England for the first time in Sunday's rematch against New Zealand as regular skipper Sarah Hunter is pushed to the bench.

title: Covid: Pfizer says antiviral pill 89% effective in high risk cases
description: The company stopped clinical trials early because initial results for the drug were so positive.

title: Brexit: Time is running out on NI protocol talks, says Frost
description: Lord Frost says he hopes to make progress as he arrives at meeting with Maros Sefcovic in Brussels.

title: Sir David Amess murder suspect to enter plea next month
description: Ali Harbi Ali is charged with the murder of the Southend West MP and faces a trial in March.

title: England captain Farrell tests positive for Covid-19 day before Tonga Test
description: England captain Owen Farrell tests positive for Covid-19 before Saturday's Autumn Nations Series opener against Tonga.

title: Yorkshire cricket chairman Hutton resigns
description: Yorkshire chairman Roger Hutton resigns over the club's response to racism experienced by former player Azeem Rafiq.

title: Africa's week in pictures: 29 October - 4 November 2021
description: A selection of the best photos from the African continent and beyond.

title: Queen flies to Sandringham for long-planned break
description: It comes as the 95-year-old monarch continues her two weeks of rest following advice from doctors.

title: HMS Queen Elizabeth: Life on board Royal Navy aircraft carrier
description: Able Rating William Augustine shows the BBC around the Royal Navy aircraft carrier as it heads home.

title: Abba on new album Voyage: We don't need to prove anything
description: As the band release Voyage, Benny and Bjorn speak to the BBC about being compared to their old music.

title: COP26: Emissions of rich put climate goals at risk - study
description: The carbon footprint of the wealthiest will grow but that of the poorest will stay small, a study says.

title: The Papers: 'Tory Owen goal' and 'horror at the morgue'
description: The resignation of Tory MP Owen Paterson and the trial of David Fuller feature on the front pages.

title: Taxi driver shortage prompts public safety fears
description: More than half of licensed drivers - 160,000 workers - have not returned following the pandemic.

title: 'The way my boss monitored me at home was creepy'
description: The government is urged to update the law to deal with a sharp rise in surveillance of home workers.

title: Wishcycling: The dos and don'ts of being good at recycling
description: Ever paused over the recycling bin, wondering whether to add a pizza box? You could be a wishcycler.

title: A journey from slum to Sydney, upended by the pandemic
description: Tushar Joshi's dreams of studying in Australia on a scholarship have been upended by Covid-19.

title: How pop star Zara Larsson made a seven-figure sum on Roblox
description: The Lush Life singer has sold thousands of items of virtual merchandise inside the game.

title: As winter looms, reports of starvation in North Korea
description: North Korea's leader has compared the current situation to the terrible famine of the 1990s.

title: COP26: Indigenous Amazon activist 'got death threats' after speech
description: Txai Suruí says she worries for her safety and that of other young climate activists.

title: How fresh is your food? Sensors could show you
description: Households contribute the most food waste - so what if you could track spoilage in real time?
